answers.answer: Did they have you fast? I had to take mine again as I was very close to a fail..they forgot to tell me to fast, so the second time around i passed with flying colors!
At how many weeks do you take this test

With the one hour test, they didn't want me to fast. I ate a very small breakfast. It's the 3hr test they would've had be fast for. But thankfully I don't have to take that one.My drs does the test at 28 weeks. But I read online that it can be done between 26 and 28 weeks.

question: I just barely passed. 140 means you have it and I was 136. Ill take it. I'm gonna be more careful on the things I eat, but I'm so happy I passed it and that my baby boy is doing good. His heart rate was 130 and she said it was nice and strong. :)
title: my 1hr gestational diabetes test
